Do not turn on initially.description: By default the display will always be turned on for the first 90 seconds after starting the addon. This is designed as a safeguard, so that you can always set the display back into 'on' mode from the touch screen. You can disable this feature if you prefer.

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
